document.full_text: texas was unable to re-sign pitcher cliff lee, but it did sign the free-agent infielder adrian beltre and took a chance by signing brandon webb.
document.title: on baseball: losing their ace, rangers go to plan b
lines_and_colors: texas was unable to re-sign pitcher cliff lee, but it did sign the free-agent infielder adrian beltre and took a chance by signing brandon webb.
